Articles.Content: I think it would be cool if we could see the asteroids, in the new update, fall from space from the surface. It would be just like a meteor shower!

you can look into this but it is a bit dead and may or may

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/49420-Micrometeorites?highlight=micrometeorites
Thats close. What I mean is like being able to see the asteroid burn up from KSC or even in orbit.
